title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 360.4 - Hours for public inspection
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 360.4 - Hours for public inspection

State Regulations
(a) This department shall accept requests for public access to records and produce
such records from 8:30 a.m. to 4:30 p.m. on all days the department is
regularly open for business. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
360.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
